Title: Relates to suspending a vehicle registration after a third violation for overtaking and passing a stopped school bus
Summary: Provides for the suspension of a vehicle registration after a third school bus safety camera violation for overtaking and passing a stopped school bus.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspending a registration after a third violation for overtaking and passing a stopped school bus
